name: furniture-store_get_all_products
description:
Get all furniture products, optionally filtered by room and category.

Args:
    room: Filter by room (Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Office, Outdoor)
    category: Filter by category (Sofas, Tables, Chairs, Beds, etc.)
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of products with basic information

name: furniture-store_get_product_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific furniture item.

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product (e.g., "LR001")

Returns:
    Product details including dimensions, material, and assembly info

name: furniture-store_search_products
description:
Search furniture products with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: Search term to match against name and description
    room: Filter by room (Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Office, Outdoor)
    min_price: Minimum price filter
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    material: Filter by material (Wood, Metal, Fabric, Leather, etc.)
    assembly_required: Filter by assembly requirement (True/False)
    in_stock_only: Only show products that are in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching products

name: furniture-store_get_rooms
description:
Get all available room categories.

Returns:
    List of rooms (Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Office, Outdoor)

name: furniture-store_get_categories
description:
Get all furniture categories, optionally for a specific room.

Args:
    room: Optional room to filter categories for

Returns:
    List of furniture categories

name: furniture-store_get_product_dimensions
description:
Get detailed dimensions for a furniture item.

Useful for checking if furniture will fit in a specific space.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to get dimensions for

Returns:
    Dimensions (width, height, depth) and weight

name: furniture-store_get_assembly_info
description:
Get assembly information for a furniture item.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to get assembly info for

Returns:
    Assembly requirements, estimated time, tools needed, and difficulty

name: furniture-store_get_delivery_slots
description:
Get available delivery time slots.

Args:
    zip_code: ZIP code for delivery zone filtering
    date_start: Start date for slot search (YYYY-MM-DD)
    date_end: End date for slot search (YYYY-MM-DD)

Returns:
    List of available delivery slots with dates and times

name: furniture-store_schedule_delivery
description:
Schedule a delivery for a furniture item.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to schedule delivery for
    slot_id: The delivery slot ID to book
    address: Delivery address

Returns:
    Delivery confirmation with date and time

name: furniture-store_get_my_deliveries
description:
Get the current user's scheduled deliveries.

Returns:
    List of scheduled deliveries with dates and status

name: furniture-store_cancel_delivery
description:
Cancel a scheduled delivery.

Args:
    delivery_id: The delivery ID to cancel

Returns:
    Cancellation confirmation

name: furniture-store_add_to_cart
description:
Add a furniture item to the shopping cart.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to add
    quantity: Number of units to add (default 1)

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: furniture-store_get_cart
description:
Get the current shopping cart contents.

Returns:
    Cart items with quantities, prices, weights, and delivery requirements

name: furniture-store_clear_cart
description:
Clear all items from the shopping cart.

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: furniture-store_checkout
description:
Complete the purchase of items in the cart.

Creates an order and clears the cart. For heavy items, remember to schedule delivery.

Returns:
    Order confirmation with order ID and total

name: furniture-store_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's purchase history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of orders to return (default 20)

Returns:
    List of past orders with items and totals

name: furniture-store_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in user's profile information.

Returns:
    User profile with user_id, name, email, phone, and default_address
